name: Judgement Came
description:
----- Judgement Came -----

A relaxing game that tells a poem in reverse. Feel free to post your score in the comments, it's helpful to see how easy/hard everyone found the game..

This was my project for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2! The theme was "rewind" and I wanted to try do something creative (plus, I didn't want to worry about coding any complicated "rewind" mechanics). I do hope you enjoyed playing!

----- Resources -----

  • GitHub: Project source code
  • Font: Droid Sans
  • Made with Godot Engine 3.2!
  • Music composed with Ardour 6....
  • Sound effects made with sfxr
